Actions.Name: Love-struck
Actions.Description: A foe of the [name]'s choice in range4 must save. On a successful save, the foe is pacified. On a failed save, the [name] chooses itself or one of its allies. Until the end of their next turn, all other characters than the chosen character are immune to all damage and effects from the chosen foe.

Actions.Name: Donkey
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a character in range. They grow donkey ears on the top of their head. While marked, they are pacified+, and after they use any non-basic ability, the [name] may shove them 2 in any direction. At the end of their turn, they may save to end this mark, ending it on a success.
